name: Mini Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator
about: What it is:A gentle, rice-based powder exfoliant that visibly brightens, improves the look of skinâ€˜s texture, and clears pores..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Lightweight Powder.Highlighted Ingredients:- Licorice, Grapefruit, and Phytic Acid from Rice Bran: Visibly even skin tone, leaving your skin looking glowing and smooth..Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This gentle powder exfoliates, leaving the skin looking smoother and brighter. The formula activates upon contact with water, foaming into a creamy paste and releasing papain, salicylic acid, and rice actives. It reduces the appearance of wrinkles, uneven skin tone, and hyper-pigmentation while a soothing blend of green tea and colloidal oatmeal calms the look of redness.
ingredients: -Papain Enzymes and Salicylic Acid: Draw out excess oil, clear clogged pores, and smooth the look of skin..-Rice Bran-Derived Phytic Acid: Gently exfoliates to visibly brighten and balance uneven skin tone..-Colloidal Oatmeal: Calms skin, reducing the appearance of redness and irritation....Microcrystalline Cellulose, Magnesium Oxide, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Colloidal Oatmeal, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Hydrogenated Coconut Acid, Allantoin, Papain, Salicylic Acid, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, PCA, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Isethionate, Lauryl Methacrylate/Glycol Dimethacrylate Copolymer, Maltodextrin, Melaleuca, Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch Hydroxyethyl Ether, Water/Aqua/Eau, Limonene, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wet hands and face..-Dispense about a half teaspoon into wet hands, add a little water, and lather until you feel the powder completely dissolve into a smooth, foamy paste..-Apply to the face in circular motions, avoiding the eye area..-Massage gently for one minute, then rinse thoroughly with warm water..-Tip: Combine with Special Cleansing Gel (sold separately) to create a foam-like lather so you can cleanse and exfoliate in one step. .-Leave on skin for an extra minute for extra brightening benefits.

reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it, but doesn't do much. I have combination, semi-sensitive skin and this didn't feel like it was 'exfoliating'. Good if you're looking for a light exfoliater. Be sure to properly hydrate your skin after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is fantastic, and I love the resultsâ€”but the price for the mini size is disappointing! It's $27 plus tax for just 13g, while the full size is $92 for 74g. By that math, the mini should cost closer to $16. The only other option is the full size, so it feels a bit unfair for those of us wanting to try a smaller amount. Iâ€™d happily buy the mini if it were more reasonably priced! Going to try a DIY rice flour scrub next time. It's like SAMPLE size ðŸ˜­

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a miss.... Imo, it made my skin really dry and made my texture even worse. When I stopped using it, my pores looked better. I do want to note that i did start adapalene so maybe it only looks better because of my adapalene progress

reviews.review_title: Great for my acne and pores
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I walked away from it because I didn't like the dispensing system. It kept getting wet inside and ruining the product (I use it when in shower). I noticed straightaway the difference in my skin when not using it. So, I went back and now my skin is much better. It still is problematic with the dispensing system, but I found a way to keep it dry.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this exfoliator on and off for a few years now, and I notice that I keep coming back to it, so it's only fair that I give it a review. When I use it consistently, I really see a difference in my texture, which is a problem area for me. I would recommend starting with the small size and seeing how your skin responds to it before going for the larger bottle.

THIS WORKS!
